A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m upset . Episode 8 totally sucked . They are forcing these new characters down your throat !! They just push the characters we fell in love with aside and kill them off like they are meaningless. These new characters are uncharismatic and difficult to fall in love with. This damaged the series as far as I’m concerned . Thank goodness for the classics !!! These new episodes are just a knock off of the old story line only worse. The only relevant difference is that they were able to do much more for the legacy of Star Wars in the 70’s and 80’s with soooo much less technology !
